alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Louis County through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Cusson, to 8 miles east of Orr, to near Cook, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Vermilion around 500 PM CDT. Buyck around 505 PM CDT. Crane Lake around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis
